name: Lin
info:
A young officer exuding an imposing aura.
A clean freak who can't stand a single speck of dust. She also holds herself and others to high standards. This makes her seem a stickler for rules, but she is amiable to discussions.
Her elite education made her what she is today: A decisive, competent perfectionist.
description:
The only daughter of Harunobu, the previous local Archon. She has been groomed to be the successor. Despite not having taken the seat yet, popular opinion already favors her as the next Archon in line.
She has been receiving rigorous combat training since childhood, which makes her much more suitable for fighting on the front line than pushing paperwork in an office, and her results definitely back that up.
From the central district to the lower city, she is incredibly popular with the people.
like: Tea, scent of laundry detergent, fried tofu

skills.name: Normal Attack
skills.description: While on the ground, use Shadoweave to launch 5 consecutive attacks. First Attack: Deal damage equal to 59.9% of ATK + 3. Second Attack: Deal damage equal to 57.1% of ATK + 3. Third Attack: Deal damage equal to 49.5% of ATK + 3. Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to 114.2% of ATK + 6 and suspend the target. Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to 152.2% of ATK + 8.

skills.name: Aerial Discharge
skills.description: While airborne, use normal attack to attack 5 times in a row. First Attack: Deal damage equal to 30.6% of ATK + 2. Second Attack: Deal damage equal to 55.6% of ATK + 3. Third Attack: Deal damage equal to 48.2% of ATK + 3. Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to 111.2% of ATK + 6. Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to 148.3% of ATK + 8.

skills.name: Scattered Soil
skills.description: After the second normal attack on the ground or in mid-air, hold normal attack to trigger Scattered Soil. Attack the target position, dealing damage equal to 83.2% of ATK + 4 and knocking the target down. Passive: After unleashing Scattered Soil on the ground, rapidly tapping normal attack will immediately unleash Brief Bloom (the 3rd stack).

skills.name: Brief Bloom
skills.description: Hold normal attack to unleash Brief Bloom. Can be charged for up to 3 stacks, gaining hyperbody and control immunity during charging. First stack: Deal damage equal to 73.9% of ATK + 4. Second stack: Deal damage equal to 146.8% of ATK + 246.4. Third stack: Deal damage equal to 13% of ATK + {5}.

skills.name: Falling Shadow
skills.description: Hold normal attack in mid-air to trigger Falling Shadow. Plummet from the skies, dealing damage equal to 160% of ATK + 8 and knocking the target down.

skills.name: Dodge
skills.description: Dodge right before being hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of enemies within the area. Become immune to hitstun for 0.5 seconds while dodging.

skills.name: Leafy Green
skills.description: Unleash Leafy Green at the target while performing a backflip, dealing damage equal to 70% of ATK + 4, generating 1–3 epiphyllums upon hit, and forming a Green Field that lasts for 5 seconds. When enemies in the Green Field lock onto the Wanderer, their movement speed is reduced by 50%. Passive: Can be unleashed on the ground or mid-air. Passive: Immediately break the control if under control effect and automatically release Leafy Green without using any dodge attempts. Skill cooldown lasts for 20 seconds.

skills.name: Excited Flow: Flashing Stream
skills.description: Create a Moonlight Realm around yourself for 15 seconds. Your damage dealt in the realm is increased by 10%, jumping ability increased by 20%, and endurance consumption reduced by 50%. Cooldown: 30 seconds. Enter the special state Airbloom when using Shadoweave in the realm. Your fall speed is greatly reduced and you can perform multiple double-jumps. In this state, using the directional controls and jump button while mid-air will perform a Roam and launch an attack on the target. Upon hit, deal damage equal to 66% of ATK + 3 and randomly generate 1–3 epiphyllums. Passive: In the Moonlight Realm, 1 epiphyllum will be generated near 1 target every 0.8 seconds. Passive: When you use Shadoweave in Moonlight Realm, an extra 50% of damage is dealt to enemies with less than 20% HP. Passive: When you use Shadoweave in Moonlight Realm, incoming damage will be detected and you will blink away from the target's location. Cooldown: 10 seconds. Passive: Weapons Master Flame: When Shadoweave is paired with 2 flame weapons, Moonlight Realm is converted to Flame: Moonlight Realm, which lasts for an extra 4 seconds when burning targets. Targets with the shield take an extra 15% flame damage. Volt: When Shadoweave is paired with 2 volt weapons, Moonlight Realm is converted to Volt: Moonlight Realm, with a 65% chance of not consuming a dodge attempt when dodging, and a 35% boost to dodge attack damage. When Volt Resonance is activated, volt damage is boosted an extra 30%. Frost: When Shadoweave is paired with 2 frost weapons, Moonlight Realm is converted to Frost: Moonlight Realm. The targets in the realm will be inflicted with Frostbite for 15 seconds after taking frost damage 10 times, and receive an extra 22% damage from frost attacks during this period. The number of attacks does not stack when a target is already Frostbitten. Physical: When Shadoweave is paired with 2 physical weapons, Moonlight Realm is converted to Physical: Moonlight Realm. When you have an HP Shield, deal damage equal to 50% of ATK + 3 to targets within range every second. Balance: When Shadoweave is paired with any two different elemental weapons (among flame, volt, frost, and physical weapons), the Wanderer's ATK is increased by 15% in the realm, and counted as activating flame, volt, frost, and physical resonance without resonance effects.

skills.name: Gravity Weave
skills.description: When weapon charge is full or Phantasia is triggered, switching to this weapon from another weapon removes all debuffs from the wielder and unleashes Gravity Weave with a stronger absorption force, dealing damage equal to 368.5% of ATK + 19. Then explode and create a ranged diffusion wave after 5 seconds, dealing damage equal to 184.3% + 10. Damage immunity lasts for 2.6 seconds when the skill is active (unavailable in Apex League).

weapon_type.name: Altered Damage
weapon_type.description: When the weapon is fully charged, the next attack will mark the target, causing an explosion after 5 seconds. Additionally inflict 25% of all damage received by the target while the mark exists, up to a total of 560% of your ATK. Only 1 mark can be added on a target at a time.

weapon_resonance.description: When pairing Shadoweave with other weapons, the Weapons Master effect can be created. Epiphyllum will appear around the target randomly and explode within 1–3 seconds, dealing 60% area damage.

advancement: Normal attacks now deal area damage upon hit. When there is another epiphyllum within the epiphyllum explosion area, increase the damage of each of the subsequent epiphyllum explosions by {0}%, up to a maximum of {1}%. The epiphyllum generation interval from Moonlight Realm is now reduced to 0.5 seconds.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by 16%.
The epiphyllum generation interval from Moonlight Realm is now reduced to 0.3 seconds. Epiphyllums will attach to the enemy. The duration of Moonlight Realm is now increased to 20 seconds.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by 32%.
When under the effect of Moonlight Realm, gain 30 weapon charge every second and increase the damage of discharge skill by {0}%.

Switch modes on Moonlight Realm up to 2 times. Gain 1 attempt after skill cooldown and another 1 attempt by charging discharge. Use any weapon discharge 3 times to gain +1 on the Moonlight Realm count. Effective even when Shadoweave is in the off-hand slot. When under the effect of Moonlight Realm, increase damage by {0}%.

traits.name: Epiphyllum Glamour
traits.description: Increase epiphyllum explosion damage by 20%. Reduce all resistance by 7% upon hit by epiphyllums for 7 seconds. This effect does not stack.
